item.title: Bam-Bam Sally's Rumor Mill: Freedom House Spring Cleaning Edition
item.description: Bam-Bam Sally reports from the street corners: somebody cleaning out Freedom House real quick, lobby firm money trail, and why the PPP phones going to voicemail.
